description.value:
Carved in this wooden disc is a humanoid eye, painted in muted shades that blend in with the wood. The eye's pupil continually twitches and moves, scanning its bearer's surroundings.

  • Armor(revelation) You aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} creatures of the eye's level or lower, or creatures of the eye's level or lower using surprise attack, though you can still be flanked.
  • Weapon When you make a Strike with the weapon against a target that's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}, hidden, or undetected, the DC of your flat check to target it is 3 if the target is concealed or 9 if it's hidden or undetected.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zvKWclOZ7A53DObE]{Clairvoyance}.
